author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Convert 2  DDD algorithms for HGCal to dd4hep format

#### PR validation:

Matched the two algorithms. Final testing will be done while all algorithms of HGCal DDD will be transported

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

It is intended for the master only
title: Phase2-hgx185 Add 2 algorithms for HGCal to DD4Hep format
